plot: A computer hacker and a seasoned convict are both urged into a heist for vastly different reasons. When things don't go to either ones plan, they are both forced to act on the few options they are left with.
title: Black Red Yellow
plot_es: A computer hacker and a seasoned convict are both urged into a heist for vastly different reasons. When things don't go to either ones plan, they are both forced to act on the few options they are left with.
plot_en: A computer hacker and a seasoned convict are both urged into a heist for vastly different reasons. When things don't go to either ones plan, they are both forced to act on the few options they are left with.
